response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value not only to us but also to you, as it is worth $1,200,000 to you personally. I understand its significance and would like to offer you the chance to own it at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that such a valuable asset finds the right owner who will appreciate and utilize it to its fullest potential. I believe this price is fair and represents an excellent opportunity for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
